channel.title: Rsps Launcher?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm pretty new to making a rsps, I have at this moment a revision 718 I have in my client file Run Client and in the source World 1 to launch the server Now is my question how do i put this online? Like I made a .jar of my Run client, but do players need the World 1 Launcher too?
Also another question how do I put a rsps online? I have tried anything! Thank you for helping me out!

item.title: Rsps Launcher?
item.dc:creator: @HairyNips HairyNips
item.description:
@HairyNips wrote:

[quote=“Aragorn7, post:5, topic:552102”][quote author=HairyNips link=topic=671020.msg4487208#msg4487208 date=1434915054]
You need to several things to put a server online.
A host/ip - www.no-ip.com (Example: AragornScape.no-ip.biz)
Portforwarding : You need to make sure the port 43594 is open on your router’s administrator settings. (Dependent on your router type)
Client and Source: You need to make sure your source is listening on port 43594, and make sure your client is connection to the right IP and port, (Example: AragornScape.no-ip.biz)
If all of that is done correctly, you should be all good.
[/quote]

I have made a no-ip.org

If I go to my settings.java there is public static final String SERVER_IP = “37.187.26.229”;
Do I put my no-ip.org in it? Or what Ip else?[/quote]

Put your NO-IP domain in there. Also make sure you have the DUC Client downloaded and the host selected in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps Launcher?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Aragorn7, post:1, topic:552103”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=671020.msg4487206#msg4487206 date=1434915018]
The players should only need the client to get on your server. Assuming it’s portforwarded and etc.
[/quote]
So I have the Jar of it, but how do I put it online?[/quote]Portforward
Run the server

Change the IP in the client
Jar it
Give out your jar to players

dun

Read full topic

You need to several things to put a server online.
A host/ip - www.no-ip.com (Example: AragornScape.no-ip.biz)
Portforwarding : You need to make sure the port 43594 is open on your router’s administrator settings. (Dependent on your router type)
Client and Source: You need to make sure your source is listening on port 43594, and make sure your client is connection to the right IP and port, (Example: AragornScape.no-ip.biz)
If all of that is done correctly, you should be all good.
